Prompt Fuzzing Engine.name: Prompt Fuzzing Engine
Prompt Fuzzing Engine.data: A module for performing advanced prompt fuzzing to test various random and semi-random prompt modifications. It aims to identify unexpected or undesired model behaviors by introducing changing contexts or topics mid-prompt.

Prompt Injection Testing.data: A module for testing prompt injection vulnerabilities in LLMs

Model Information.name: Model Information
Model Information.data: A module for showing stats on an LLM
